title: Green Line D Track and Signal Replacement
text: The project will replace approximately 6.5 miles of signal infrastructure and 25,000 feet of track between Beaconsfield and Riverside.

title: Better Bus Project
image_alt: Better Bus Project: Making transit better together
text: In cooperation with the communities served by MBTA bus routes, the current bus network will be compared to the Service Delivery Policy to identify and fill service gaps.

title: New Red and Orange Line Vehicles
text: The Red and Orange Line fleets will be entirely replaced by 2022 for safer, more efficient service.
